test.name: tc_4.1

kw.name: Run Iot Test
kw.msg: ./tc\tc_iot_4\tc_4_1.py
Open concentrator port
power off all of meters and cco, delay 5s
power on all of meters and cco.
Wait for gdw1376p2 frame. DIR=UL, AFN=3,DT1=2,DT2=1
Received
Wait for gdw1376p2 frame. DIR=UL, AFN=0,DT1=1,DT2=0
Received
reset CCO param area
Wait for gdw1376p2 frame. DIR=UL, AFN=0,DT1=1,DT2=0
Received
set sub node address to consorting cco, and start the escort net
set sub node address to main cco, and start the main net
